attributes.action: Reduce the price of insurance for young persons!.
attributes.additional_details: I'm sure many young people will back me on this debate on getting insurance cut in price for young people!.
attributes.background: I am currently getting ready to do driving lessons but insurance for young people e.g 17,18 year olds is disgusting. Why is it so high in cost?, stop being stereotypical and thinking everyone are mad drivers. There is careful drivers out there who want to drive carefully!.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you would like the Government to do to reduce the cost of insurance for young people, or whether you'd like the Government to take action on all kinds of insurance, or just car insurance.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/166847
